issue.title: [C] Minimalistic C library implementing Arrow data structures, IPC read/write
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3266](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3266). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am interested in a small C89/C99 library for interacting with Arrow data structures in standard C with minimal dependencies. Using https://github.com/dvidelabs/flatcc it should be possible to deal with IPC metadata in C as well without involving a C++ compiler
